title: Help me
body: Whenever I start a game it instantly crashes. And I can't exit it and manually have to restart my laptop. Everything works before the game starts. Champ select, etc. But right after the loading screen it freezes in fountain. PLEASE HELP.

replies.body: I am having this exact same issue. Using Windows 10, if that helps
The above information should help you out!  Let me know!

Unfortunately updating my drivers hasn't fixed the problem. When the game begins, my speakers also play a crackling sound once or twice before the game freezes my computer. I have updated all my drivers, from sound to graphics. Do you have any other ideas?

Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can look into this some more and figure out what's going on.  I recommend downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), which will automatically obtain logs.  Attach them to your ticket for context, and we'll respond asap!
I updated my drivers and it seeems to have worked. Thank you for the response!
Yes also having same exact problem.... i'm not sure but i think it started crashing after the new windows update yesterday. I tried uninstalling the update but to no avail.
My initial response in this thread should help out.  Make sure to update your drivers, as upgrading your windows may have made some of them a bit wonky.

It sounds like you might be having a hardware or driver issue that's causing the game to not render properly.  As a first step, you want to make sure that your drivers are up to date.  I recommend going over our [game crash ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)guide which will provide you a series of steps to get this fixed up.  Hopefully, that will get you back in game without further issue!
